io.github.teamfractal.util

Class RandomEvents

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.teamfractal.util.RandomEvents

  • public class RandomEvents
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains most of the logic needed to implement the random events used throughout the game
    Author:
    jcn509, cb1423, bp713
